newsitem.title: NETHERLANDS: Blair, Chirac to meet in Paris on June 11.
newsitem.headline: Blair, Chirac to meet in Paris on June 11.

text.p: British Prime Minister Tony Blair will travel to Paris for talks with French President Jacques Chirac on June 11, a spokesman for Chirac's office said on Friday.
There were no details on what the two leaders would discuss.
Separately, British aides said they were trying to set a date for Blair to meet Italian Prime Minister Romano Prodi in Rome.

Blair, who swept to power following his Labour party's overwhelming election win on May 1, was attending his first European Union summit in the Netherlands on Friday, joining his new colleagues in an attempt to forge EU treaty reforms due to be agreed at an Amsterdam summit on June 16-17.
